text: avar(mūsā)"niccayamāka appacumāṭu nilattil uḻavaṭittō, nilattiṟku nīr pāyccavō payaṉpaṭuttappaṭātatu, ārōkkiyamāṉatu, evvitattilum vaṭuvillātatu eṉṟu iṟaivaṉ kūṟukiṟāṉ" eṉak kūṟiṉār. "Ippoḻututāṉ nīr cariyāṉa viparattaik koṇṭu vantīr" eṉṟu colli avarkaḷ ceyya iyalāta nilaiyil appacu māṭṭai aṟuttārkaḷ
